Who I am

Hey! Welcome to my portfolio.
My name is Julio Cesar and I work as a freelancer Front-end Developer.
I'm an undergraduate in IT Management, who loves to read and learn about software development, programming languages and network security. I currently live in Florianopolis, Santa Catarina (Brazil) and I'm 24 years old.
Even though I currently work as a freelancer, I'm open to all kind of job opportunities. I've had experience with sales and graphic design in the past, which gave me good communication and Photoshop skills.

Some technologies I can use:

  • React
  • JavaScript
  • NodeJS
  • Sass
  • Bootstrap
  • Tailwind
  • Webpack
  • WordPress
